data.title: Christiane Amanpour & James Rubin seem like an odd pairing, don't they?
data.meta_description: Do you agree?I saw him in London last week and spent the rest of the day trying to work out who he was - then, suddenly, got it.
data.text:
Do you agree?

I saw him in London last week and spent the rest of the day trying to work out who he was - then, suddenly, got it.

[post redacted because linking to dailymail.co.uk clearly indicates that the poster is either a troll or an idiot (probably both, honestly.) Our advice is that you just ignore this poster but whatever you do, don't click on any link to this putrid rag.]

Ni. He looks like a third rate JK Jr and she loved John John. Some guys find her British/French/Iranian mix to be hot. I honestly think she needs a makeover of sorts. She is so frumpy at times.

He used to be very hot when younger now he looks average

This is a relationship of egos. They were a ‘power couple’ back then. That’s all you need to know about them.
